attributes.action: Privatising public services must be outlined in a manifesto prior to an election
attributes.additional_details:
Royal Mail
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-28250963

Eurostar
https://www.railnews.co.uk/news/2016/01/20-eurostar-sale-evidence-of-undervalued.html

Northern Rock
https://www.theguardian.com/politics/reality-check-with-polly-curtis/2011/nov/17/northern-rock-sale-good-deal-for-taxpayers

RBS
https://www.theguardian.com/business/2015/aug/04/rbs-sell-off-george-osborne-defends-1bn-loss
attributes.background: Since 2010, the Government has privatised a huge number of publicly owned assets. Royal Mail, Eurostar, our shares in RBS, Lloyds Bank and Northern Rock. Most of these sales are facilitated with no accountability. The Royal Mail sell off was largely believed to be under sold by nearly £1 billion

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to nationalise certain companies if that is something you would like to see happen.
